events.title: Email regarding pretrial motions
events.description: Christian Everdell sends an email concerning pretrial motions and exhibits to be filed under seal in the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated January 26, 2021, concerning the criminal case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell (docket 20 Cr. 330).
The email discusses pretrial motions and exhibits that are to be filed under seal, indicating sensitive material in the Maxwell prosecution.
The sender is Christian Everdell, and recipients include Jeff, Luca, and Laura Menninger, suggesting a legal team or group of professionals working on the case.
The email domain 'CohenGressercom' appears in the Message-Id, potentially linking it to the law firm Cohen & Gresser.
